import { Header, Todo } from "../components" import notFound from "../assests/notFound.svg" import { UserContext } from "../context/UserContext" import { useContext, useState } from "react" const IndexPage = () => { const {setLogin ,login, username, setUsername} = useContext(UserContext) return (
{!login && <>

User Not Found Please Login

}
{login && <>
{username} Todo List
}
) } export default IndexPage {/*

My To-Do List

Please input task
*/}
